short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We are going to change how you fundamentally learn Quran and Arabic.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quran Recitation with Tajweed rules
You should sign up for a Quran recitation course if you want to learn Quran recitation. There are many benefits to learning Quran recitation, including its peace-bringing power, enlightenment, and fulfillment. After all, if you memorize Quran correctly, you will be welcomed by the angels, including the most revered ones. If you want to reach the highest level of holiness and enjoy the pleasure of Paradise, you must learn Quran in detail.
Read more: https://quranion.com/quran-recitation-with-tajweed-rules/
-----------
Arabic Reading course
If you are looking for an online Arabic Reading course, you have come to the right place. This course is a perfect complement to your Arabic language study. You will learn about Arab traditions, culture, and customs while practicing reading, listening, speaking, and writing. The course has led by an instructor who guides you through the course materials and enables you to schedule one-on-one virtual meetings with a teacher if needed. After completing the course, you can read and speak Arabic fluently!
Read More: https://quranion.com/arabic-reading-course/
-----------

Islamic Studies online Course
Islamic studies refer to the academic study of Islam and can be studied at the undergraduate and graduate levels. Islamic studies programs typically cover a wide range of topics, from the Quran and Hadith to Islamic law, history, and culture. Students who pursue Islamic studies do so to understand their Muslim faith better or as part of a broader effort to learn about world religions.
Read More: https://quranion.com/islamic-studies-online-course/
